# 𓅽

𓅽 #bꜣ Ba Bauch-Gefühl bird bard breath Bote 魄 po4 псэ psă πsoul

𓎻 𓅡 𓏱 | soul, BA | Bauch-Gefühl ⲯⲩⲭⲏ psyche !

𓅡 is both the earliest and most widespread glyph to serve as an logogram for bꜣ, among
E10 𓃝 G53 𓅽 and possibly F9 𓄇 with the same meaning.

𓃀 _? 𓅣 Venus /Ba'ah/ later form Ba ???
𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 Venus ≈ phoenix cult?

𒍣 ≈ 𒊺 𒉺 ŠE⋅PA •SP vs •PS psyche 𓅽 𓅡

𒍣𒆥𒄣 zᵖi-qi-qu spectre, ghost, phantom speciō/kuck +++
𒍣𒆥𒄣 zᵖi-qi-qu Spuak “phantom” ⇔ Spuk-Gespenst شبح šabah spettro sprite
𒍣𒆥𒄣 ᵖzi-qi-qu psyche 𓅽 𓅡
